properties.name: image
properties.description: ID or name of the Image the Server is created from

properties.name: name
properties.description: Name of the Server to create (must be unique per Project and a valid hostname as per RFC 1123)

properties.name: server_type
properties.description: ID or name of the Server type this Server should be created with

options.name: automount
options.description: Auto-mount Volumes after attach

options.name: datacenter
options.description: ID or name of Datacenter to create Server in (must not be used together with location)

options.name: firewalls
options.description: Firewalls which should be applied on the Server's public network interface at creation time

options.name: labels
options.description: User-defined labels (key-value pairs)

options.name: location
options.description: ID or name of Location to create Server in (must not be used together with datacenter)

options.name: networks
options.description: Network IDs which should be attached to the Server private network interface at the creation time

options.name: placement_group
options.description: ID of the Placement Group the server should be in

options.name: public_net
options.description: Public Network options

options.name: ssh_keys
options.description: SSH key IDs (`integer`) or names (`string`) which should be injected into the Server at creation time

options.name: start_after_create
options.description: Start Server right after creation. Defaults to true

options.name: user_data
options.description: Cloud-Init user data to use during Server creation. This field is limited to 32KiB

options.name: volumes
options.description: Volume IDs which should be attached to the Server at the creation time. Volumes must be in the same Location

options.name: labels
options.description: User-defined labels (key-value pairs)

options.name: name
options.description: New name to set

options.name: sort
options.description: Can be used multiple times

options.name: status
options.description: Can be used multiple times, the response will contain only Actions with specified statuses

properties.name: placement_group
properties.description: ID of Placement Group the Server should be added to

properties.name: iso
properties.description: ID or name of ISO to attach to the Server as listed in GET `/isos`

properties.name: network
properties.description: ID of an existing network to attach the Server to

options.name: alias_ips
options.description: Additional IPs to be assigned to this Server

options.name: ip
options.description: IP to request to be assigned to this Server; if you do not provide this then you will be auto assigned an IP address

properties.description: New alias IPs to set for this Server

properties.description: Primary IP address for which the reverse DNS entry should be set

options.description: If true, prevents the Server from being deleted (currently delete and rebuild attribute needs to have the same value)

options.name: rebuild
options.description: If true, prevents the Server from being rebuilt (currently delete and rebuild attribute needs to have the same value)

properties.name: server_type
properties.description: ID or name of Server type the Server should migrate to

properties.name: upgrade_disk
properties.description: If false, do not upgrade the disk (this allows downgrading the Server type later)

options.description: Description of the Image, will be auto-generated if not set

options.description: Type of Image to create (default: `snapshot`)

properties.name: network

options.name: ssh_keys

options.name: type
options.description: Type of rescue system to boot (default: `linux64`)

properties.name: image
properties.description: ID or name of Image to rebuilt from

properties.description: Start of period to get Metrics for (in ISO-8601 format)

properties.name: end
properties.description: End of period to get Metrics for (in ISO-8601 format)

options.name: step
options.description: Resolution of results in seconds
